title: Bug 10022: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
OB: In the Java perspective, the "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu is always enabled
EB: The "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should be enabled only when there are changes to save or when the project is selected
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the Java perspective. 2. Right-click on any element in the workspace. 3. Check if the "Build" action in the context-sensitive popup menu is enabled.
